name.description: Human friendly name for this feed.

source.description: Details about how to get this feed.

url.description: URL where this feed can downloaded.

headers.description: HTTP headers to include in order to download this feed.

checkCertificate.description: (Only for HTTPS requests) Whether to check or not the https certificates when downloading this feed.

credentials.description: Credentials for Basic Authentication. (Alternatively, you can provide a Basic Auth header in the headers field.)

timestampCheck.description: Enables timestamp checking between a preoviuos feed and the one from the external source.

sourceOfSource.description: URL of the provider of this feed.

hardCoded.description: If the URL contains identifiers, dates, etc.

outputFileName.description: The name of the file to store this feed. If this is not specified, then it will be taken from Content-Disposition response header or from the URL file name.

hasRT.description: If this feed should be enhanced with real time information.

excludedFiles.description: List of the files to exclude when parsing this feed.

includeOnlyFiles.description: List of the files to include when parsing this feed.
